displayProperties.name: Tom Chapman
displayProperties.description:
_Creator of Braytech._
This player created the app through which you're reading this tooltip.

displayProperties.name: "I made this for you"
displayProperties.description: _You're my little pogchamp, Guardian._ ðŸŒž

displayProperties.name: "shattered" or something
displayProperties.description: "I annoyed Tom and all I got was this stupid medal"

displayProperties.name: "We found this, for you..."
displayProperties.description:
On the ground somewhere...
Behind an Arby's...
(use d2foundry.gg)

displayProperties.name: Bungie Developer
displayProperties.description:
_Beware the Architects._
This player _could_ delete you.

displayProperties.name: Bungie API Developer
displayProperties.description:
_Beware the Architects._
This player builds with Bungie's API.

displayProperties.name: Submind
displayProperties.description: _A part of the very fabric from which Braytech is weaved, you stand along side Charlemagne, Malahayati, and Voluspa. Your actions enable greater things to come to pass._

displayProperties.name: Seraph
displayProperties.description: _Join Rasputin's peacekeeping force and work closely with the Warmind and return peace to the Sol system. Your contributions are beyond invaluable._

displayProperties.name: Researcher
displayProperties.description: _As one of few surviving researchers who've escaped the treachery of Clovis Bray, you now stand as a beacon of knowledge and hope._

displayProperties.name: Guardian
displayProperties.description: _You are a Guardian: the embodiment of all that is and may be. Your potential unmatched, you alone can bring change to the Sol system on grand scales._

displayProperties.name: Civilian
displayProperties.description: _If workplace health and safety had any idea what was going on over here, it'd be shut down faster than Rasputin when an isosceles triangle drops out of spooky FTL._

displayProperties.name: Patron
displayProperties.description: An invaluable Patreon subscriber.

displayProperties.name: Cryptarch
displayProperties.description: _A generous translator of Braytech._

displayProperties.name: Benefactor
displayProperties.description:
_A charitable Guardian._
This player made a donation to a great cause via the Bungie Foundation.

displayProperties.name: Well Rested
displayProperties.description:
XP gains increased by 2x for your first 5 Season Ranks this week.

Completing Seasonal Challenges grants the most progress, followed by bounties and quests.

displayProperties.name: Season Pass XP Bonus
displayProperties.description: Various XP bonuses can be unlocked by progressing the season pass.

displayProperties.name: Unique Weapon Kills
displayProperties.description: Your stats are tracked and exposed by the API via several different systems; historical stats are available for exotic weapons and track kills prior to any kill trackers being enabled.

displayProperties.name: Gear Power
displayProperties.description:
The average Power level of your currently equipped armaments.
For an accurate value, your inventory is assessed. If your inventory is not public, you'll need to authenticate with Bungie.net.

displayProperties.name: Commonality
displayProperties.description: Percentage of players who are indexed by Voluspa who've acquired this collectible or completed this record.

displayProperties.name: Expiration
displayProperties.description: This record has expiration information attached.

displayProperties.name: Score Value
displayProperties.description: This record's score value.

displayProperties.name: Score Value
displayProperties.description: This record's remaining score value over its total score value.

displayProperties.name: Score Value
displayProperties.description: This node's calculated score value.

displayProperties.name: Record intervals
displayProperties.description: Some records have intervals. Different intervals have varied requirements and score values.

displayProperties.name: Track Record
displayProperties.description:
Add this record to "Tracked Records"
_If enabled, this action syncs with your Braytech profile and will be reflected wherever you use the app._

displayProperties.name: Untrack Record
displayProperties.description:
Remove this record from "Tracked Records"
_If enabled, this action syncs with your Braytech profile and will be reflected wherever you use the app._

displayProperties.name: Add Bookmark
displayProperties.description:
Bookmark this record for later viewing.
_If enabled, this action syncs with your Braytech profile and will be reflected wherever you use the app._

displayProperties.name: Remove Bookmark
displayProperties.description:
Remove this bookmark.
_If enabled, this action syncs with your Braytech profile and will be reflected wherever you use the app._

displayProperties.name: Active Triumph Score
displayProperties.description:
The current value of all active Triumphs that have been earned and the total value of all active triumphs.

These score values change when Triumphs become legacy Triumphs.

This value is from Bungie.

displayProperties.name: Seal Score
displayProperties.description: The sum of seals you've completed.

displayProperties.name: Gild Score
displayProperties.description: The exhaustive and total count of seal gilding.

displayProperties.name: Legacy Triumph Score
displayProperties.description:
Total score of all completed legacy Triumphs.

This value is from Bungie.

displayProperties.name: Lifetime Triumph Score
displayProperties.description:
A combination of all completed active and legacy Triumph scores.

This value is from Bungie.

displayProperties.name: Collection Score
displayProperties.description: The sum of items you've amassed and stowed as apart of your arsenal.

displayProperties.name: Fish Caught Score
displayProperties.description: The sum of fish you've angled.

displayProperties.name: Fish Weight Score
displayProperties.description: The biggest catch on record.

displayProperties.name: Active Score Rank
displayProperties.description: The Leaderboards rank for the corresponding triumph score, as determined by Voluspa.

displayProperties.name: Seal Score Rank
displayProperties.description: The Leaderboards rank for the corresponding seal score, as determined by Voluspa.

displayProperties.name: Gild Score Rank
displayProperties.description: The Leaderboards rank for the corresponding gild score, as determined by Voluspa.

displayProperties.name: Legacy Score Rank
displayProperties.description: The Leaderboards rank for the corresponding triumph score, as determined by Voluspa.

displayProperties.name: Collection Score Rank
displayProperties.description: The Leaderboards rank for the corresponding collection score, as determined by Voluspa.

displayProperties.name: Fish Caught Rank
displayProperties.description: The Leaderboards rank for the corresponding fish caught score, as determined by Voluspa.

displayProperties.name: Fish Weight Rank
displayProperties.description: The Leaderboards rank for the corresponding fish weight score, as determined by Voluspa.

displayProperties.name: Total resets
displayProperties.description: All seasons' resets. Tracks from Season 4 onward.

displayProperties.name: Artifact Power Bonus
displayProperties.description: Earning XP grants Power bonuses and unlocks powerful mods on your seasonal artifact.

displayProperties.name: Latent Memories
displayProperties.description: Mysterious test nodes are scattered across Mars. What is their purpose?

displayProperties.name: Unknown Error
displayProperties.description:
An error occurred while rendering this tooltip.

This is probably a temporary error. Apologies.

displayProperties.name: Stale Profile
displayProperties.description:
An attempt to update your profile data with Bungie.net failed. Braytech was unable to reach Bungie.net.

Continued use of Braytech may resolve this issue, Bungie.net service availability permitting.

displayProperties.name: Stale Profile
displayProperties.description: Background refresh is paused due to inactivity. Interact with Braytech to reactivate the service.

displayProperties.name: Stale Profile
displayProperties.description:
Bungie.net returned old information.

Continued use of Braytech may resolve this issue, Bungie.net service availability permitting.

displayProperties.name: Stale Profile
displayProperties.description:
Bungie.net is temporarily unavailable due to maintenance.

Continued use of Braytech may resolve this issue, Bungie.net service availability permitting.

displayProperties.name: Contest Mode
displayProperties.description: This activity was finished in the contest mode window; apart of the first wave of Guardians, triumph under extraordinary circumstance and pressure.

displayProperties.name: Flawless
displayProperties.description:
This activity was started from its beginning and finished flawlessly, with no deaths.

To be eligible, **raids** must be completed after the launch of Witch Queen, **dungeons** and **lost sectors** must be started and finished by a single player, and **strikes** are specific to each player.

displayProperties.name: Solo
displayProperties.description: _Riding solo. This guardian is so cracked they don't need no stinkin' fireteam._

displayProperties.name: Duo
displayProperties.description: _Run it back to back._

displayProperties.name: Trio
displayProperties.description: _It's a threesome._

displayProperties.name: Final Blows
displayProperties.description:
_This weapon is so hot right now._

Sum of final blows by combatants using this weapon.

Outliers are determined with the formula: 
`Sum of weapon final blows >= Q3 + IQR`

displayProperties.name: Delete Loadout
displayProperties.description: Delete this loadout. This action is permanent.
_This map charts the steps on the path to the top._

displayProperties.name: Push Notifications
displayProperties.description: Push notifications can reach you when you're not using Braytech and ensure you don't miss whatever it is that you're chasing.

displayProperties.name: Lost Sectors
displayProperties.description: Never miss a rotating lost sector or reward again. These sectors aren't so lost anymore, are they...

displayProperties.name: Weather Forecast
displayProperties.description: Predictive and real time insights for prudent Guardians. Data-driven forecasts, risk indicators, and personalized recommendations for confident decision-making. Never leave the comfort of your jumpship again without being perfectly prepared!

displayProperties.name: XÃ»r
displayProperties.description: A peddler of strange curios, XÃ»r's motives are not his own. He bows to his distant masters, the Nine.

displayProperties.name: Ada-1 Shaders
displayProperties.description: How drippy you look is only limited by your choice in shaders. Keep in contact with Ada in case you're missing the goods.

displayProperties.name: Banshee-44 Legendaries
displayProperties.description: As master weaponsmith for the Tower, Banshee supplies Guardians with only the best.

displayProperties.name: Crucible
displayProperties.description:
Be notified of which modes Lord Shaxx has configured the Crucible for.

Fight for fame and glory, but in oddly specific ways and at a weekly cadence.

displayProperties.name: Overview
displayProperties.description: Receive a dense information burst every reset summarising ritual activities, cyclical challenges, and other points of interest.

displayProperties.name: This Week at Bungie
displayProperties.description: Get the latest Bungie news delivered direct to you. Fresh and hot since 2004. ï„¡

displayProperties.name: Subscriber-Only Features
displayProperties.description:
**Custom Braytech username**

Instead of `https://bray.tech/1/4611686018449662397` you could have `https://bray.tech/@/Dare`

**Advanaced Leaderboards features**

Quickly inspect the difference between two neighbouring players

_More coming soon..._
